Projects.title: Study Notes
Projects.description: AZ 204 study notes created in markdown, with static site generation using jekyll.

Projects.title: Cofee Chats
Projects.description: Coffee chats application with backtracking algorithm, and csv read/writes, built using vanilla JS and Node.JS.

Projects.title: Art Auction Messenger Bot
Projects.description: Messenger Bot created for Facebook Messenger Hackathon. Created using webhooks, Facebook templates and APIs, and Node.JS. Backend hosted in Heroku.

Projects.title: Colors' Generator
Projects.description: A color generation custom React application, with css modules integration.

Projects.title: Budget App
Projects.description: A React app made from tutorial, with state management using Redux.

Projects.title: Notepad Chrome Extension
Projects.description: A chrome extension made in React, saving to localStorage at present.

Projects.title: Weather App
Projects.description: A EJS, Express, and Node web application using OpenWeather and Pokemon APIs, as well as HTML's auto-location feature to determine the weather at various locations in the world.

Projects.title: Haptics Android App
Projects.description: A proof of concept Android haptics application, with Pure Data sound software integration, made as part of Waterloo Human Computer Interaction's lab research project.
